tool_description:
World Gold Price Live API is like a digital tool that provides real-time information about the price of gold worldwide. It acts like a messenger between you and the latest gold prices, delivering the current value of gold in various currencies and markets instantly.

The Gold Price of gold is in "per ounce".

This API allows developers and businesses to access this up-to-date gold price data programmatically, making it easy to integrate into websites, applications, or financial tools. With th...
name: World Gold Price Live API
title: World Gold Price Live API

api_list.name: Get Gold Price By Country Code
api_list.description: You will Get currency and Gold Price  by sending country code.
